The rock is analyzed in a laboratory, and the results are recorded in the table above. Which columns in the table provide all the information necessary to determine the mole ratio of <math alttext="C a" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mtext>Ca</mtext></mrow></math> to <math alttext="M g" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mtext>Mg</mtext></mrow></math> in the rock?

skill.text: 5.A: Identify quantities needed to solve a problem from given information (e.g., text, mathematical expressions, graphs, or tables).
